product.summary: A professional project management software, covering the core process of software development projects
Create, organise and discuss work with your team
A web-based project management and issue tracking tool
Open source project management for technical teams
A professional project management software, covering the core process of software development projects
Create, organise and discuss work with your team
A self-hosted Slack-alternative, flexible, messaging platform
Open source project management for technical teams

overview.overview: Focalboard is an open source project management for technical teams. Keep everything and everyone on track, all in the Mattermost platform.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Focalboard is a project management tool that focuses on collaboration and tracking project progress through an intuitive interface and powerful features. The software supports multi-person online editing and real-time synchronization updates, ensuring smooth information sharing and communication among team members. In addition, Focalboard provides rich task management features, such as task allocation and prioritization, to help team members better allocate work and determine work priorities.
